name: Frozen
description:
Character cannot use Skills. (Lasts until the end of this Round)
When this character receives Pyro DMG or Physical DMG, removes this effect and increases DMG taken by 2.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Character cannot use Skills.</color> (Lasts until the end of this Round)\nWhen this character receives $[K103] or $[K100], removes this effect and increases DMG taken by 2.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Character cannot use Skills.</color> (Lasts until the end of this Round)\nWhen this character receives {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> or {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>, removes this effect and increases DMG taken by 2.
